seo.title: The Circle London | Premium Tattoo Studio in Central London
seo.description: Award-winning tattoo studio in London specializing in custom designs, geometric patterns & fine line work. Book your consultation today.

Tattoo Destination
hero.subheadline: Custom artwork crafted with precision and passion in the heart of London. Where your vision becomes timeless art.
hero.imageAlt: Professional tattoo artist working on custom design at The Circle London

portfolio.subtitle: Every piece tells a story, crafted with precision and artistic vision

sessions.subtitle: Choose the perfect session for your vision
sessions.guarantee: 100% satisfaction guarantee or free touch-up within 30 days

testimonials.quote: Alex's attention to detail is incredible. My geometric sleeve turned out even better than I imagined. The studio atmosphere is so professional and welcoming.
testimonials.author: Sarah Chen

testimonials.quote: Best tattoo experience I've ever had. The Circle London sets the standard for professionalism and artistry. My fine line work is absolutely perfect.
testimonials.author: Marcus Thompson

paragraphs: Alex Mitchell founded The Circle London with a vision to create more than just tattoos – to craft personal stories in ink. With over 8 years of experience and training from some of Europe's most respected artists, Alex specializes in geometric patterns, fine line work, and contemporary designs that push creative boundaries.

Every piece begins with understanding your story. At The Circle, we believe tattoos should be as unique as the person wearing them. From initial consultation to final healing, we're committed to delivering an experience that exceeds expectations and creates art that lasts a lifetime.
about.callout: Each design is hand-drawn and completely original to you
about.imageAlt: Alex Mitchell, founder and lead artist at The Circle London tattoo studio

items.question: How far in advance should I book?
items.answer: We recommend booking 2-4 weeks in advance for custom pieces. Smaller designs may be available sooner. Contact us to check current availability.

items.question: What's your deposit policy?
items.answer: We require a £100 deposit to secure your appointment, which goes toward your final session cost. Deposits are non-refundable but can be transferred to a new date with 48 hours notice.

finalCta.headline: Ready to Create Something Extraordinary?
finalCta.subheadline: Join hundreds of satisfied clients who chose The Circle London for their tattoo journey

booking.modalDescription: Tell us about your tattoo vision and we'll get back to you within 24 hours to schedule your consultation.
booking.successMessage: We'll contact you within 24 hours to confirm your appointment details. Check your email for next steps.
